title: India
summary: Committed to India for 120 years, backed by an unmatched global network, Citi offers institutions a range of financial products and services, including corporate and commercial banking, investment banking, treasury and trade services, markets and custody services. Citi India has a network of Citi Solution Centers in the areas of technology, processing, analytics and financial processes.
